creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
This is a spin off of the Locale related issues raised in bug 32064 and combined with concerns raised in 
discussions on commons-dev and log4j-dev mailing lists on December 2004.

It would be beneficial if log4j had mechanisms to:

Configure a Locale to be used for logging distinct from the application default locale
Support localization of logging messages, level keywords etc.
Colorization of message based on level should be considered as an addition use case.  See bug 19920.

text: I believe the underlying issues have been addressed with LogMF and LogSF in the extras companion.
